example.text: The only difference is , [0] in those cities the poor are housed [*-1] in high-rise-project apartments each consisting of one room , with rusty pipes called [*] plumbing , rodents and cockroaches everywhere and nonworking elevators -- and with the building patrolled [*] by gangs and drug dealers .

example.text: Lloyd 's vast trading hall houses a warren of well-polished desks .
